Security starts with visibility
Security starts with visibility
Discover all known & unknown devices with Qualys Global IT Asset Inventory
It’s free! Unlimited devices
Automated normalization and categorization
Qualys Global IT Asset Inventory (Global AssetView) continuously detects and inventories all IT assets – whether on-prem (devices and apps), endpoints, clouds, containers, OT or IoT. It automatically discovers, normalizes and catalogs all your IT assets and captures their details — such as running services, installed software, traffic, hardware/software lifecycles, software licenses and more!
Learn More
Make better security and business decisions
Standardize on a single source of truth for all your teams by eliminating variations in product and vendor names
Identify assets ‘missed’ in your security and compliance program
Detect unknown or unauthorized devices that connect to a specified network
Seamlessly synchronize your assets with ServiceNow CMDB
Instantly upgrade to see the security and compliance posture of each asset
Knowing what’s on your global hybrid-IT environment is fundamental to security. We made a promise to the world of security: make everything visible. That’s why we decided to make our Global IT Asset Inventory (Global AssetView) app free of charge so that everyone around the world can benefit.
